works.description:
The Kindle edition of "Where Snowflakes  

Dance and Swear: Inside the Land of Ballet", a copyrighted book about  
ballet written by me and published by Cadwallader and Stern in 2011. This 

edition is protected by DRM and legitimately available only from
Amazon.com  
at the link above. It is being offered illegitimately by the site listed  

below, whose links are provided by Google Shopping at the fifth entry on  

the page noted below [please note that this link was previously removed by
 
Google November 6, 2012 in response to my request replied to via email
with  
the subject line "Re: [#1141519893] Your Request to Google]:
